meanings.definition: A detailed list or schedule, especially of documents or items.
meanings.sent1: The bordereau provided a clear list of all the items in the inventory.
meanings.sent2: She carefully reviewed the bordereau to ensure nothing was missing from the shipment.
meanings.sent3: The bordereau was so long, it looked like a never-ending scroll of paper.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked like a bordereau, organizing thoughts into neat categories.
meanings.sent5: The bordereau was like a map, guiding her through the sea of paperwork.

meanings.definition: A document used in insurance to list items covered by a policy.
meanings.sent1: The insurance agent handed her a bordereau detailing the coverage of her policy.
meanings.sent2: He kept the bordereau in a safe place in case he needed to make a claim.
meanings.sent3: The bordereau seemed like a magical shield protecting his belongings.
meanings.sent4: Her bordereau was a treasure map leading to the safety of insured items.
meanings.sent5: The bordereau was a guardian angel, watching over her possessions.

meanings.definition: A form used in banking to list checks deposited for clearing.
meanings.sent1: The teller carefully filled out the bordereau with all the check details.
meanings.sent2: He submitted the bordereau along with the checks for processing.
meanings.sent3: The bordereau felt like a secret code revealing the value of each check.
meanings.sent4: His bordereau was a bridge connecting him to his deposited funds.
meanings.sent5: The bordereau was a key unlocking the door to his deposited wealth.
